text: Aduga Migi Machanupa5:24 Jisuna sijinnaba mahakki atop pao mingthol ama. aduna taibangpan asida pap kokpinaba matik lei haibadu nakhoina khangnanaba eina nakhoida utkani.” Adudagi Ibungona pangtha-sithabagi leinana naba nupa aduda hairak-i, “Eina nangonda hairi, hougatlu aduga nahakki hipnapham adu loukhattuna nayumda chatlu.”
